articles.title: Scientists were stunned by the origin of a radio signal from the depths of space - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: A steady cosmic signal from 2 billion light-years away is challenging everything we thought we knew about fast radio bursts. This groundbreaking discovery could redefine our understanding of the Universe. Don't miss out on this cosmic revelation!
articles.content: In a major breakthrough for astrophysics, researchers at Northwestern University in Illinois have picked up on a mysterious and steady signal from way out in space. This fast radio burst, called FRB2… [+3403 chars]
